Topic.Title: One sound cancelling out the other?

Posts.EditableText:
Does Quest not support two sounds running simultaneously?

I have a sound triggered at start which is looped and a few other one-offs, but when these one-offs are triggered, the looped one is cancelled out.
Posts.HTML:
Does Quest not support two sounds running simultaneously?

I have a sound triggered at start which is looped and a few other one-offs, but when these one-offs are triggered, the looped one is cancelled out.

Posts.EditableText: In the old forum I had a LONG DISCUSSION about this.  I could not get two sounds to play simultaneously.  I never did get it resolved but the suggestion had to do with calling a file ID and upload the other sound normally.  I was way confused and ended up giving up on it.  Good luck.
Posts.HTML: In the old forum I had a LONG DISCUSSION about this. I could not get two sounds to play simultaneously. I never did get it resolved but the suggestion had to do with calling a file ID and upload the other sound normally. I was way confused and ended up giving up on it. Good luck.
